column9:
Intensiv kursus i Lund.... sultne og trætte.... god mad og venlig betjening var det hele værd!!
Kan klart anbefales!!

Besøgte stedet med en kollega. 
Typisk italiensk indretning med små borde, måske lidt for små.

Een prima maaltijd; maar door de goede reputatie en flinke aanloop kunnen er wachttijden ontstaan. Voor er een plaatsje vrij...More
Je kunt hier een uitstekende pizza eten, het is er altijd gezellig druk en bediening is snel en vriendelijk. Een...More
Op kantoor is iedereen lyrisch over deze tent maar het doet me niet super veel. Pasta was lekker maar niet...More

A great Italian inspired concept with several facilitites around Skåne. The restaurant in Lund is the smaller format CASA. It serves lunch and dinner. The menu holds antipasti, pizzas, salads, pastas and desserts. Our 10 year old totally loved the pizzas! The pizzas are thin...More

Thin pizzas with a great choice of toppings. Taste almost like in Italy!  There is also pasta for those who feel like it, but the pizzas are generally better. It is quite popular so it's best to make reservations. Service can be slow.
I love this pizza! They use fresh ingredients and real cheese. i definitely recommend this restaurant.

column7: Feel like having a tasty pizza? Go to Vespa.
column9:
I've visited the restaurant many times during more than 3 years.
Though I had the impression the quality went down a little, I still recommend the pizza (piccante is one of my favorites) or also the special lunch options. A few times I had pasta...More
Amazing pizza but I tend to get it to take home as the noice in the restaurant is very loud in peak-hours. And if i take it home i get a little ice-cream for afters :D

The pizzas are okay, but we were disappointed with the poor quality of some of the promised Italian specialties on the pizzas. Even if you like garlic, the pizzas with garlic are too garlicky. Our waitress did not seem to like her job, not even...More

I've had their pizza and it's fine. It has too much cheese, but it's fine. However it costs twice as much as a crappy pizza from across the street of wherever you live, but it doesn't taste better. Vespa has better quality ingredients but somehow...More
Good location; excellent, friendly service; good pizza; all-you-can eat salad; gets busy (even early 6pm) - suggest booking.

I have been to VESPA many times and the Pizzas are super delicious. They have nice, a bit unusual, combinations with fresh veggies etc. 
The pasta dishes are ok, but I would always go for a pizza there. I haven't experienced rude staff at all....More
Best pizza in Lund
The restaurant is located close to the railway station, just over the square. Pizza is normal but you have to pay for the tap water, for every person. Service ok

column7: High in carbs and fat but keeps a fool hungry
column9: Tasty but poor fillings in The pizzas , very good service but unhappy Employees ( not impolite though, rather worn out). They have The means to make it better and more Fancy , but its a franchise feeling .
Truly amazing pizzas, a bit expensive though. The pastas are also excellent so are their coffee. Service varies.

My favorite pizzeria in the Skane region with nice atmosphere, good pricing, helpful service and excellent pizza choices.  Menu also contains pasta and a few more Italian specialties.  Salad is green (not the pizza-salad we are used to in Sweden)

column7: Nice Italian food, a little pricey
column9: Great pizza and pasta. Pizza is thin crust. They offer a salad bar included in your meal. Right north of the train station, to the east of the city center, so it's great for travelers. A little pricey though.

column7: You must test their "Felino" pizza. It's just great!
column9: You must test their "Felino" pizza. It's just great!
Good place for dinner, family firendly and good food. A little off the beaten track, but very close to the station.

The pizzas where quite good, but since the waitress was so incredibly rude I am never going back there again!

Went with a group of friends for a dinner on a Wednesday night. Ordered, after having to explain the menu to the waiter, a Bellini cocktail.  

Not sure who told this place how to make one, but they really misunderstood it. A proper Bellini is...More

column7: Very creative delicious pizzas and pasta

Very tasty food but the service is so appalling that I seriously do not intend to visit it again unless really desperate.
Super goda pizzor

The restaurant is nicely decorated and the atmosphere is cosy. We had carpaccio as a starter and two different pastas as main dishes. Everything was delicious, the portions were generous and the price was a bit high but still adequate in terms of food quality....More
nice place

column7: Good thin pizza with fresh ingredients.
column9: I really like the thin-crusted pizze with really fresh ingredients, especially the quattro stagioni. The pasta dishes are, however, at best,ordinary. Take-out is a good alternative to eating at the restaurant.
Best pizza in Lund

Very popular with great pizzas. Can get very crowded.
Really tasty foods! Very kind stuff!! Take the salmon pasta!!! Hmmm so delicious!!!

column7: Once a favourite, but has become worse.

column7: Great ingredients, sloppy value for money
column9: Whenever I've ordered from Vespa for a takeaway, my bread is always burned on top, greasy on the bottom and lacking in toppings. The toppings you do get are fresh and flavourful, but are let down by thin, lifeless, burned and yet somehow undercooked bread.

It is not easy to find restaurants with good, fast service and with food that both we and our children (aged 6 and 9) enjoy. But this place is such a place. Really enjoyed the Pizza bianci. Fresh ingredients and good cheese. Friendly staff.
fantastic price / quality ratio on pretty much every restaurant in the cofoco empire, this one included

column7: Very good choice for pizza in Lund

column7: One of the best places for Pizza in Lund

column7: Genuine Italian feeling and really nice food
column9:
The restaurant offers a nice combination of both location near the central station as well as genuine Italian cuisine for those wanting to try good food indeed.
